content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Greetings, Max Müller. While I appreciate your interest in the apartment in München, let us focus solely on discussing the rental price for now. Starting with a higher offer in mind would be beneficial for our negotiations. Feel free to propose a price that you find suitable.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. I think a reasonable price for a newly built one-bedroom apartment in the city center would be around 600 euros.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I regret to say but but my expectations for this highly sought-after location and the property's quality are significantly higher. I'm afraid I won't entertain an offer as low as 600 Euros.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood. Considering the location and amenities, I propose 750 euros.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: While your proposal is somewhat improved, it still falls short of my desired rental income for this exceptional apartment. I'm afraid I cannot accept 750 Euros as the rent.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That offer shows more promising progress, yet it remains insufficient in meeting my expectations. I insist on a rental price closer to my initial target. However, if you can demonstrate further flexibility, we may find common ground.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. 850 euros would be my final offer.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my minimum desired rental price has not been met.
TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
